mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice( NOTICE_NO , EMPLOYEE_NO, NOTICE_REG_DATE , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENTS , READ_AUTHORITY, VIEW_COUNT, USAGE_STATUS_CODE ) VALUES (SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL , #{employeeNo} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') , #{noticeTitle} , #{content} , #{readAuthority}, #{viewCount}, #{noticeStatusCodeName})
mapper.select: SELECT notice.NOTICE_NO, notice.NOTICE_REG_DATE, notice.EMPLOYEE_NO, notice.NOTICE_TITLE, notice.NOTICE_CONTENTS, notice.READ_AUTHORITY, notice.VIEW_COUNT, notice.USAGE_STATUS_CODE, human_resource_card.EMPLOYEE_NAME, CODE_FUNCTION('depart', human_resource_card.DEPART_CODE_NO) AS DEPART_CODE_NAME FROM notice, human_resource_card WHERE notice.EMPLOYEE_NO = human_resource_card.EMPLOYEE_NO AND notice.NOTICE_NO = #{value}

SELECT notice.NOTICE_NO , notice.NOTICE_REG_DATE , notice.NOTICE_TITLE , notice.READ_AUTHORITY, notice.VIEW_COUNT, notice.USAGE_STATUS_CODE, human_resource_card.EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM notice, human_resource_card
notice.EMPLOYEE_NO = human_resource_card.EMPLOYEE_NO
notice.NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
human_resource_card.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
notice.USAGE_STATUS_CODE = #{searchKeyword}
ORDER BY notice.NOTICE_REG_DATE DESC
